Q_DESC:
Nobita forgot to do his homework so he ask his friend Doremon to help him. Doremon searches his 3-D pocket and gives him a gadget. The gadget works only when Nobita is able to reverse a stack using recursion.Help Nobita to use gadget by reversing stack using recursion.

INPUT
First line contains the size of stack
The second line contains the elements of the stack
OUTPUT
The output contains reverse of the stack using recursion.
